publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4669 Ms Maureen Watt: Raising Awareness of Alcoholâ€”That the Parliament notes the initiative by Aberdeen Joint Alcohol and Drug Action Team to have youngsters aged between 16 and 24 in the north east submit story ideas for a film competition in a bid to raise awareness of alcohol issues; believes that such an initiative is an excellent way to raise awareness of alcohol among young people and put across a peer-driven message; hopes that as many young people as possible will enter the competition and take part in the subsequent film production, and commends Aberdeen Joint Alcohol and Drug Action Team for this innovative approach to educating young people about alcohol.

S2M-4669 Raising Awareness of Alcohol (lodged on 21 July 2006) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Jim Mather*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Brian Adam*, Ms Sandra White*, Stewart Stevenson*, Frances Curran*, Donald Gorrie*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-4669 Raising Awareness of Alcohol (lodged on 21 July 2006) Robin Harper*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-4669 Raising Awareness of Alcohol (lodged on 21 July 2006) Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-4669 Raising Awareness of Alcohol (lodged on 21 July 2006) Shiona Baird*, Carolyn Leckie*
